title: 用启动游戏后发送报错.然后再也进不去游戏.
author: 杨过
txt_content:
用JAVA7-JAVA8都用过了，也都重装过了，游戏也下载纯净版。还是进不去。

以下内容是报错:
[19:43:26] [Game Launcher/ERROR] 
---- Hello Minecraft! Crash Report ----
  Version: 2.4.2.63
  Time: 2016-07-07 19:43:26
  Thread: Thread[Game Launcher,6,main]

  Content: 
    java.lang.NullPointerException
    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.core.version.MinecraftLibrary.getDownloadInfo(MinecraftLibrary.java:142)
    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.core.download.MinecraftDownloadService.getDownloadLibraries(MinecraftDownloadService.java:60)
    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.core.launch.GameLauncher.makeLaunchCommand(GameLauncher.java:102)
    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.util.HMCLGameLauncher$1.run(HMCLGameLauncher.java:88)


-- System Details --
  Operating System: Windows 7 (amd64), 6.1
  Java Version: 1.8.0_91, Oracle Corporation
  Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation

replies.author: q1224344027
replies.txt_content: 服务器地图或者内部java与外部不同

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
你要更换启动器了，建议BMCL和BakaXL。
原因：HMCL作者已弃坑，接手的公司技术不行

replies.author: eachman
replies.txt_content: 换一个启动器试试吧.用Launcher比较好一点.其他的启动器看自己的喜好了.反正窝基本都用Launcher.比较简便而且不容易报错=.=

replies.author: 熊镔
replies.txt_content:
hmcl启动器新版本出了点问题
用这个http://pan.baidu.com/s/1dFwkLSt

replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content:
补全资源文件
推荐BN和HMCL
最好是BN

replies.author: uhuichongfu
replies.txt_content:
这个启动器版本太旧了，好像也不再开发了。
试试这个，http://www.mcelf.com/
也许高手不屑用，但如果只想简单游戏，还是不错的，傻瓜化的操作，MOD、皮肤都很简单。
